author.label: William Shakespeare
author.biografi: William Shakespeare adalah seorang pujangga, dramawan, dan pemain sandiwara berkebangsaan Inggris, secara luas dianggap sebagai penulis drama berbahasa Inggris terhebat dan dramawan termasyhur di dunia. Ia sering disebut sebagai penyair nasional Inggris dan dijuluki Pujangga dari Avon

author.label: Agatha Christie
author.biografi: Dame Agatha Mary Clarissa Christie, DBE adalah seorang penulis fiksi kriminal Inggris yang terkenal dengan enam puluh enam novel detektif dan empat belas koleksi cerita pendeknya. Karyanya yang paling terkenal bercerita tentang detektif fiksi Hercule Poirot dan Miss Marple

author.label: Jim Kwik
author.biografi: For the last 25 years, Jim Kwik has helped everyone from celebrities to CEOs to students improve their memory, increase their decision-making skills, learn to speed-read, and unleash their superbrains.

author.label: Jostein Gaarder
author.biografi: seorang intelektual sekaligus penulis novel, cerita pendek dan buku anak-anak dari Norwegia. Gaarder sering menulis dengan menggunakan sudut pandang anak-anak, menonjolkan rasa penasaran mereka akan dunia.

author.label: Steven Kotler
author.biografi: adalah seorang penulis, jurnalis, dan pengusaha Amerika. Dia terkenal karena buku-buku non-fiksinya, termasuk Abundance, A Small Furry Prayer, West of Jesus, Bold, The Rise of Superman dan Stealing Fire.

author.label: David Sargent
author.biografi: David J. Sargent (born 1931) was the President of Suffolk University in Boston, Massachusetts from 1989 to 2010.Sargent is a native of Newport, New Hampshire and graduated from the Suffolk University Law School magna cum laude in 1954, ranked number one and president of his class.

author.label: ERBE SENTANU
author.biografi: Erben Sentanu merupakan founder dari Katahati Institute, sebuah transformasi dan perusahaan manajemen hati. Selain itu ia juga pengarang buku best seller Quantum Ikhlas dan Zona Ikhlas.

books.title: Shakespeare's plays
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.desc: Shakespeare's plays portray recognisable people in situations that we can all relate to - including love, marriage, death, mourning, guilt, the need to make difficult choices, separation, reunion and reconciliation. They do so with great humanity, tolerance, and wisdom. They help us to understand what it is to be human, and to cope with the problems of being so.

books.title: Whodunit
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.desc: A whodunit or whodunnit is a complex, plot-driven variety of the detective story in which the puzzle is the main feature of interest. The reader or viewer is provided with clues from which the identity of the perpetrator of the crime may be deduced before the solution is revealed in the final pages of the book.

books.title: Miss Marple
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.desc: Miss Marple is a gentle, respectable old woman who has a remarkable ability to solve mysteries and crimes. She first appeared in the novel The Murder in the Vicarage (1930). There have been many film and television versions of the stories.

books.title: Macbeth
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.desc: Macbeth adalah sandiwara tragedi karya William Shakespeare yang ditulis sekitar tahun 1606. Drama ini adalah salah satu tragedi Shakespeare yang terkenal dan juga yang paling pendek. Terjemahan buku ke dalam bahasa Indonesianya dengan judul yang sama dilakukan oleh Trisno Sumardjo
books.label: ALIF NAFIS A.

books.title: Limitless
books.author: Jim Kwik
books.desc: No matter your age, background, or level of education, you can learn new ways to use your brain. If you've been searching for better ways of coping and growing, I'm here to help you fall in love with learning again.

books.title: Why are we Here?
books.author: ALIF NAFIS ALGHANY
books.desc: Thinking why are we here, live in this wolrd

books.title: Living in the Light: A guide to personal transformation
books.author: David Sargent
books.desc: “ You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them. ” ― Michael Jordan

books.title: Quantum Ikhlas
books.author: ERBE SENTANU
books.desc: Buku spiritual science motivation karya Erbe Sentanu (member of Global Spiritual Computing Research Group) ini menukik jauh melampaui kekuatan berpikir positif, untuk mengakses daya terbesar manusia yaitu kekuatan Perasaan Positif dari dasar hati yang Ikhlas.

books.title: Want to read   Buy on Amazon       Rate this book The Art of Impossible: A Peak Performance Primer
books.author: Steven Kotler
books.desc: Bestselling author, peak performance expert and Executive Director of the Flow Research Collective, Steven Kotler decodes the secrets of those elite performers—athletes, artists, scientists, CEOs and more—who have changed our definition of the possible, teaching us how we too can stretch far beyond our capabilities, making impossible dreams much more attainable for all of us.

books.title: Dunia Sophie
books.author: Jostein Gaarder
books.desc: Novel ini sebagian besar terdiri dari dialog-dialog antara Sophie, seorang gadis remaja, dan seorang pria misterius bernama Alberto Knox, yang saling terkait dengan plot yang unik dan misterius, novel ini menjadi sebuah novel sekaligus panduan dasar filsafat. Pada tahun 1999, novel ini diadaptasi ke dalam sebuah film di Norwegia.
